about.summary: An R to C/C++ interface that runs the Leiden community detection algorithm to find a basic partition (). It runs the equivalent of the 'leidenalg' find_partition() function, which is given in the 'leidenalg' distribution file 'leiden/src/functions.py'. This package includes the required source code files from the official 'leidenalg' distribution and functions from the R 'igraph' package.  The 'leidenalg' distribution is available from <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg/> and the R 'igraph' package is available from <https://igraph.org/r/>. The Leiden algorithm is described in the article by Traag et al. (2019) <doi:10.1038/s41598-019-41695-z>. Leidenbase includes code from the packages: igraph version 0.9.8 with license GPL (>= 2), leidenalg version 0.8.10 with license GPL 3.

name: r-leidenbase

about.summary: An R to C/C++ interface that runs the Leiden community detection algorithm to find a basic partition (). It runs the equivalent of the 'leidenalg' find_partition() function, which is given in the 'leidenalg' distribution file 'leiden/src/functions.py'. This package includes the required source code files from the official 'leidenalg' distribution and functions from the R 'igraph' package.  The 'leidenalg' distribution is available from <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg/> and the R 'igraph' package is available from <https://igraph.org/r/>. The Leiden algorithm is described in the article by Traag et al. (2019) <doi:10.1038/s41598-019-41695-z>. Leidenbase includes code from the packages: igraph version 0.9.8 with license GPL (>= 2), leidenalg version 0.8.10 with license GPL 3.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.31' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-leidenbase
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/leidenbase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/leidenbase/leidenbase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cd0a825fa44485e957847321c02b32ac5205675e56df00cd883ea50b9aab23e1

build:
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}        # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - r-igraph                         # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib('m2w64_c') }}          # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem            # [win]
    - {{ posix }}sed                   # [win]
    - {{ posix }}grep                  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake              # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper      # [win]
    - pkg-config
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}coreutils             # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip                   # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-igraph >=0.9.0
    - glpk
    - gmp  # [win]
    - libblas
    - liblapack
    - liblzma-devel
    - libxml2
    - zlib
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-igraph >=0.9.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('leidenbase')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('leidenbase')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/cole-trapnell-lab/leidenbase
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: 'An R to C/C++ interface that runs the Leiden community detection algorithm to find
    a basic partition (). It runs the equivalent of the ''leidenalg'' find_partition()
    function, which is given in the ''leidenalg'' distribution file ''leiden/src/functions.py''.
    This package includes the required source code files from the official ''leidenalg''
    distribution and functions from the R ''igraph'' package.  The ''leidenalg'' distribution
    is available from <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg/> and the R ''igraph'' package
    is available from <https://igraph.org/r/>. The Leiden algorithm is described in
    the article by Traag et al. (2019) <doi:10.1038/s41598-019-41695-z>. Leidenbase
    includes code from the packages: igraph version 0.9.8 with license GPL (>= 2), leidenalg
    version 0.8.10 with license GPL 3.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
